contact-help: You are guaranteed to get a premium account as well as the opportunity to win one of the prizes
name: Your Name *
users-help: Watch your favourite streams together with your friends in virtual rooms. Communicate using text, audio or video chat, exchange ideas, impressions and just spend time with pleasure!
play-help: Now you decide how to watch the stream. Pause and rewind the video whenever you want - make your browsing more pleasant and interesting!
cloud-help: The best moments of streams can be stored in your personal library, which allows you to review them and share the most interesting fragments with your friends!
about-date1-help: Streaming is the ability to watch the course of the game. But not always it is possible to do with your friends. Technical problems are often the reason. Therefore we are the project which breaks all the barriers of communication between interlocutors in the Stream joint viewing. By creating virtual rooms, you choose what to watch, how to watch and with whom to watch. Save, manage and enjoy watching streams with us!
